item.title: Sorting an array of objects with the sortBy method of Prototype
item.description: Here is an example of how easy it is to sort an array of objects using the Enumerable.sortBy method of the Prototype framework: varobj1={lastName:"Lacava",firstName:"Alessandro"};varobj2={lastName:"Brown",firstName:"John"};varobj3={lastName:"Simpson",firstName:"Bart"};vararr=[obj1,obj2,obj3];//order by last name varsorted=arr.sortBy(function(obj){returnobj.lastName.toLowerCase();});varstr="";sorted.each(function(obj,index){str+=index+1+" - "+obj.lastName+" "+obj.firstName;});//display the elements ordered by last name document.write(str);
